definition: to set one's heart on/to set one's choice on
category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: Cmay be and diligence raise luck.
sentences.chinese: 属意和勤奋才力抓住机遇。

sentences.english: That's what I have in mind.
Do you notice they wink when the stars go across the sky?
sentences.chinese: 当星星划过天空，你是否是属意到它正在眨眼睛？

sentences.english: Thy looks when they to Venus did ascribe.
sentences.chinese: 你看，当她们属意于维纳斯的时候。

sentences.english: Some niche operators, however, prefer a smaller, boutique approach.
sentences.chinese: 一些旅馆经营者却属意小型特色旅舍。

sentences.english: His new choice, Donilon, looks more promising.
sentences.chinese: 他新属意的多尼伦看来前途远大。

definition: compiled and published by Imperial command (old)
to succeed sb in a job/successor
to say clearly/to argue clearly/to pronounce/pronounced
to betroth a girl (in arranged marriages)
to not get along well/to be at odds
